mapper.insert: insert into mer_register_person_request (service, sign_type, sign, charset, mer_Id, version, mer_cust_id, mer_cust_name, identity_type, identity_code, mobile_id, request_url, request_data, request_time, status) values (#{service}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{charset}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{loginName}, #{userName}, #{identityType}, #{identityNumber}, #{mobile}, #{requestUrl}, #{requestData}, #{requestTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: update mer_register_person_request set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into mer_register_person_response (request_id, sign_type, sign, mer_Id, version, user_id, account_id, reg_date, ret_code, ret_msg, response_data, response_time) values (#{requestId}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{userId}, #{accountId}, #{regDate}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{responseData}, #{responseTime})
